text: Black Panther has earned a multitude of fans since his record - breaking premiere two week ago, and during last night's episode of The Tonight Show, a few of them took turns recording what they thought were just confessional videos about what the film meant to them. Little did they know, they were actually set up for a surprise from T'Challa himself, Chadwick Boseman. The fans'messages ranged from funny to sentimental, with many mentioning the significance of seeing a black superhero onscreen. ` ` It's just a great American superhero movie with people who look like me,'' one man said of the film. ` ` Basically everything that represents me was honored in this movie,'' another said.
